p: The assays were performed in triplicate at concentrations of 25, 50, 100, 200, 300, 400, and 500 µg/mL of the essential oil of A. conyzoides L. plus 1% Dimethylsulfoxide-DMSO (Merck Chemical Co.) in order to solubilize the sample and at concentrations of 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1.0, 1.5 µg/mL of the doxycycline plus 1% Dimethylsulfoxide-DMSO (Merck Chemical Co.). Analyses were performed at 18 h and 36 h after addition of the treatments to the medium. The analyses consisted of counting the percentage of infected cells on Diff-Quik (Laborclin, Pinhais, PR, Brazil) stained cell monolayer smear preparations examined under the light microscope (Aguiar et al. 2007).
